LanguageData.Terrasecurity_Gizmo_LifespanTicksRemaini: The {ITEMNAME} is a living organism. And like all living organisms, it's time is limited. Once this runs out, it will wither away.
LanguageData.Terrasecurity_Gizmo_MultiLifespanTicksRe: Open a detailed view for the currently lifespan equipment for the selected pawns.
